column4: HELP! My PlaneShift (and all sorts of other games) is like this: http://img368.imageshack.us/img368/3140/schermafdrukplaneshiftunv5.png
Looks like a problem with fonts but you could try switching between open source and binary graphics drivers
I'm on Open Source drivers now. My video card (ATI Radeon 9250) is no longer supported by ATI's official drivers.
